DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy and safety of YH16410 versus rosuvastatin and telmisartan monotherapies in patients with hypertension and hyperlipidemia
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety Study of YH16410 Versus Rosuvastatin and Telmisartan Monotherapies in Patients With Hypertension and Hyperlipidemia
DOC.criteria: Signed Informed Consent Men and women â‰¥ 19 years of age Subject who has one of 3 conditions classified by Cardiovascular Risk Factors, 10Year Risk, Blood Pressure, LDLC, TG, Coronary Artery Disease and Equivalent Females who are pregnant, breastfeeding, or of childbearing potential, unwilling to practice adequate contraception throughout the study. Other exclusions applied
